description: This file defines a Python class `DocxReader` that reads and processes DOCX files, converting them into Document objects, with support for asynchronous reading.

classes.name: DocxReader
classes.description: A class that reads DOCX files and converts them into Document objects, supporting both synchronous and asynchronous operations.

methods.name: read
methods.description: Reads a DOCX file (from Path or IO stream) and returns a list of Document objects.

methods.name: async_read
methods.description: Asynchronously reads a DOCX file and returns a list of Document objects.
